source_text: Among the new projects in fundamental research, it is also worth mentioning a submarine laboratory installed at 2000m depth offshore from Catania, to be used for R&D related inside the KM3NET project.

source_text: It's built with a full Shimano 105 drivetrain and hydraulic disc brakes, but the defining feature of this model is the lightweight OCLV Carbon frame with IsoSpeed, a decoupler at the top tube/seat tube junction that provides additional compliance over rough terrain so you can stay stronger for longer.
modified_source_text: It's built with a full Shimano 105 drivetrain and hydraulic disc brakes, but the defining feature of this model is the lightweight OCLV Carbon frame with IsoSpeed, a decoupler at the top tube/seat tube junction that provides additional compliance over rough terrain so you can stay stronger for longer.
target_text: Se on rakennettu täysin Shimano 105 voimansiirron ja Hydraulinen levy jarrut, mutta määrittävä piirre tässä mallissa on kevyt OCLV Carbon runko, jossa on isonopeus, irrotettava putki / istuin putki liitos, joka tarjoaa lisää vaatimustenmukaisuuden yli karkea maasto, joten voit pysyä vahvempi pidempään.

source_text: Our route to the Mount Cook Village (770 meters above sea level), took us through Canterbury plains and past of turquoise clear lakes towards Southern Alps and Mount Cook. In the morning we did our check out in the last minute from our motel where we were staying, which was super goog place and also started our 333 kilometers long ride.
modified_source_text: Our route to the Mount Cook Village (770 meters above sea level), took us through Canterbury plains and past of turquoise clear lakes towards Southern Alps and Mount Cook. In the morning we did our check out in the last minute from our motel where we were staying, which was super goog place and also started our 333 kms long ride.
target_text: Reittimme Mount Cookin kylään, 770 metriä merenpinnan yläpuolella, vei meidät 333 km pitkän matkan päässä sijaitsevasta Motelista.

source_text: Two bus lines serve the airport: the AirportBus Bern (line 334) connects the terminal every half-hour with Belp railway station where passengers can connect to frequent S-Bahn trains S3, S4, S31 and S44 to Bern main station.
modified_source_text: Two bus lines serve the airport: the AirportBus Bern (line 334) connects the terminal every half-hour with Belp railway station where passengers can connect to frequent S-Bahn trains S3, S4, S31 and S44 to Bern main station.
target_text: Lentokenttä on linja 334, joka yhdistää terminaalin puolen tunnin välein, ja Belpin rautatieasemalle on mahdollista saada yhteys usein liikennöitäviin juniin S3 ja S4. Bernin rautatieasemalle on linja 334, joka yhdistää terminaalin joka puolen tunnin välein, ja junat kulkevat usein S31 ja S44.
